description:
Marie has a chance encounter with RyuZU, who she thought was broken all this time.
When she finds out that it was Naoto who repaired her, Marie asks for his help to prevent the purge of the Kyoto Grid. On their way to the Core Tower, Marie finds out who is behind all the attacks on her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 真正面突破[コンフリクト]
